component.name: ParaView-XDMF3-Highorder
component.summary: Parallel visualization application with support for XDMF3 high-order functions

description.p: Parallel visualization application with support for XDMF3 high-order functions. Built with a fork of VTK: https://gitlab.kitware.com/ChristophHonal/vtk/-/tree/xdmf3-highorder
